title: Apokolokyntosis. Or A mockery upon the death and deification of Claudius Cæsar Written in Latine by Lucius Annæus Seneca the philosopher. Imprimatur, Junii 17. 1664. Roger L'Estrange.
author: Seneca, Lucius Annaeus, ca. 4 B.C.-65 A.D.
notes: The first word of the title is in Greek characters.
Imperfect; pages cropped, faded print with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
